channel.title: Posts on Even - A super concise theme for Hugo
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Even - A super concise theme for Hugo

item.title: Config Hugo
item.description: Install hugo on mac-os use brew 1. brew install hugo 2. brew upgrade hugo 3. hugo version Hugo Static Site Generator v0.37 darwin/amd64 BuildDate 4. git clone https://github.com/olOwOlo/hugo-theme-even themes/even 5. 在主题的 exampleSite 目录下有一个 config.toml 文件，将这个 config.toml 文件复制到你的站点目录下，根据自己的需求更

item.title: Test Makedown syntax for html/js/css/jsx
item.description: test html <div>AAA</div> test css span { font-size: 10px; } test js var username = document.getElementById("name"); test jsx import react from "react"; const A = () => <div>A</div>; export default A; test shell mkdir project cd project cd ../ test image
